mapper.select: SELECT CTE_CODE AS cteCode, CTE_NAME AS cteName, CTE_SYMBOL AS cteSymbol FROM CTE ORDER BY CTE_CODE ASC

SELECT NUM AS num, rankNum AS rankNum, countNum AS countNum, PRD_CODE AS prdCode, PRD_SELCODE AS prdSelCode, PRD_CTECODE AS prdCteCode, PRD_NAME AS prdName, PRD_TYPE AS prdType, TO_CHAR(PRD_PRICE, 'FM999,999,999,999,999') AS prdPrice, PRD_INFO AS prdInfo, PRD_STARTDATE AS prdStartDate, PRD_ENDDATE AS prdEndDate FROM(SELECT ROWNUM NUM, PRD_ORDER. * FROM (SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rankNum, COUNT(*) AS countNum, PRD_CODE, PRD_SELCODE, PRD_CTECODE, PRD_NAME, PRD_TYPE, PRD_PRICE, PRD_INFO, PRD_STARTDATE, PRD_ENDDATE FROM(SELECT * FROM ORD INNER JOIN PRD ON ORD.ORD_PRDCTECODE = PRD_CTECODE AND ORD.ORD_PRDSELCODE = PRD_SELCODE AND ORD.ORD_PRDCODE = PRD.PRD_CODE) GROUP BY PRD_CTECODE, PRD_SELCODE, PRD_CODE, PRD_NAME, PRD_TYPE, PRD_PRICE, PRD_INFO, PRD_STARTDATE, PRD_ENDDATE) PRD_ORDER) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRD WHERE PRD_CTECODE = #{cteCode}

SELECT NUM AS num, PRD_CTECODE AS prdCteCode, PRD_SELCODE AS prdSelCode, PRD_CODE AS prdCode, PRD_NAME AS prdName, PRD_TYPE AS prdType, PRD_INFO AS prdInfo, TO_CHAR(PRD_PRICE, 'FM999,999,999,999,999') AS prdPrice, PRD_STARTDATE AS prdStartDate, PRD_ENDDATE AS prdEndDate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, PRD_ORDER. * FROM (SELECT * FROM PRD WHERE PRD_CTECODE =#{cteCode} ORDER BY PRD_STARTDATE ASC) PRD_ORDER) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{numStart} AND #{numEnd}

SELECT PRD_CODE AS prdCode, PRD_SELCODE AS prdSelCode, PRD_CTECODE AS prdCteCode, PRD_NAME AS prdName, PRD_INFO AS prdInfo, PRD_TYPE AS prdType, PRD_STARTDATE AS prdStartDate, PRD_ENDDATE AS prdEndDate, TO_CHAR(PRD_PRICE, 'FM999,999,999,999,999') AS prdPrice FROM PRD WHERE PRD_CTECODE = #{cteCode}
SELECT SEL_CODE AS selCode, SEL_SHOPNAME AS selShopName, SEL_NICKNAME AS selNickname, SEL_EMAIL AS selEmail, SEL_PROFILE AS selProfile FROM SEL WHERE SEL_CODE = #{selCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRD WHERE PRD_SELCODE = #{selCode}

SELECT PRD_CODE AS prdCode, PRD_SELCODE AS prdSelCode, PRD_CTECODE AS prdCteCode, PRD_NAME AS prdName, PRD_INFO AS prdInfo, PRD_TYPE AS prdType, PRD_STARTDATE AS prdStartDate, PRD_ENDDATE AS prdEndDate, TO_CHAR(PRD_PRICE, 'FM999,999,999,999,999') AS prdPrice FROM PRD WHERE PRD_SELCODE = #{selCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, PRD_ORDER. * FROM (SELECT * FROM PRD WHERE prd_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR prd_info LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY PRD_STARTDATE ASC) PRD_ORDER)

SELECT NUM AS num, PRD_CTECODE AS prdCteCode, PRD_SELCODE AS prdSelCode, PRD_CODE AS prdCode, PRD_NAME AS prdName, PRD_TYPE AS prdType, PRD_INFO AS prdInfo, TO_CHAR(PRD_PRICE, 'FM999,999,999,999,999') AS prdPrice, PRD_STARTDATE AS prdStartDate, PRD_ENDDATE AS prdEndDate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, PRD_ORDER. * FROM (SELECT * FROM PRD WHERE prd_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR prd_info LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY PRD_STARTDATE ASC) PRD_ORDER) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{numStart} AND #{numEnd}

SELECT PRF_FILCODE AS prfFileCode, PRF_PRDCODE AS prfPrdCode, PRF_PRDCTECODE AS prfPrdCteCode, PRF_PRDSELCODE AS prfPrdSelCode, PRF_FILNAME AS prfFileName, PRF_LOCATION AS prfLocation FROM PRF WHERE PRF_FILCODE='0000' AND PRF_PRDCTECODE = #{prdCteCode} AND PRF_PRDSELCODE = #{prdSelCode} AND PRF_PRDCODE = #{prdCode}

SELECT PRD_CODE AS prdCode, PRD_SELCODE AS prdSelCode, PRD_CTECODE AS prdCteCode, PRD_NAME AS prdName, PRD_INFO AS prdInfo, PRD_TYPE AS prdType, PRD_STARTDATE AS prdStartDate, PRD_ENDDATE AS prdEndDate, TO_CHAR(PRD_PRICE, 'FM999,999,999,999,999') AS prdPrice FROM PRD
WHERE PRD_CTECODE = #{prdCteCode} AND PRD_SELCODE = #{prdSelCode} AND PRD_CODE = #{prdCode}
SELECT SEL_CODE AS selCode, SEL_NICKNAME AS selNickname, SEL_SHOPNAME AS selShopName, SEL_EMAIL AS selEmail, SEL_PROFILE AS selProfile FROM SEL WHERE SEL_CODE = #{prdSelCode}

SELECT VHS_BUYCODE AS vhsBuyCode, VHS_PRDCTECODE AS vhsPrdCteCode, VHS_PRDSELCODE AS vhsPrdSelCode, VHS_PRDCODE AS vhsPrdCode, VHS_DATE AS vhsDate, VHS_WISHACTION AS vhsWishAction FROM VHS WHERE VHS_BUYCODE =#{vhsBuyCode} AND VHS_PRDCTECODE=#{vhsPrdCteCode} AND VHS_PRDSELCODE=#{vhsPrdSelCode} AND VHS_PRDCODE=#{vhsPrdCode}
